[size=14pt]Features[/size]
[size=13pt]Client[/size]
- Clean look and feel. - Low memory usage (around 180mb on high detail). - Clean and smooth cache downloader - All 602 data - 10+ customizable client options - Changeable game frames - Scroll up and down with mouse on scroll interfaces
[size=13pt]Server[/size]
- Thieveing stalls for new players - Easy barrows - Working duel arena - Awesome pk point shops - Items to inventory - 10+ bosses - Lots of low level monsters - Completionists cape - All nex items workin - All pvp items - Everything clipped. - Player vs player combat damage is calculated when the weapon animation starts. - Player vs player formulas are rewritten with realistic results. - Achievement system. - Nomad will spawn in a random spot in multi wilderness each time it dies. - Bank pins. - Bank tabs. - EP drop system. - Target system. - Player killing farming tracking system. image - Pet system, supports every pet. - In-game highscores with saving, Kills, Deaths and KDR, top 10 players. image - Completionist Cape fully customizable into 10+ colours image 1 image 2 image 3 - Near Runescape clanchat excluding lootshare, image - Quick prayers.
[/CENTER]

[size=14pt]Features[/size]

[size=13pt]Client[/size]

  • Clean look and feel.
  • Low memory usage (around 180mb on high detail).
  • Clean and smooth cache downloader
  • All 602 data
  • 10+ customizable client options
  • Changeable game frames
  • Scroll up and down with mouse on scroll interfaces

[size=13pt]Server[/size]

  • Thieveing stalls for new players
  • Easy barrows
  • Working duel arena
  • Awesome pk point shops
  • Items to inventory
  • 10+ bosses
  • Lots of low level monsters
  • Completionists cape
  • All nex items workin
  • All pvp items
  • Everything clipped.
  • Player vs player combat damage is calculated when the weapon animation starts.
  • Player vs player formulas are rewritten with realistic results.
  • Achievement system.
  • Nomad will spawn in a random spot in multi wilderness each time it dies.
  • Bank pins.
  • Bank tabs.
  • EP drop system.
  • Target system.
  • Player killing farming tracking system. image
  • Pet system, supports every pet.
  • In-game highscores with saving, Kills, Deaths and KDR, top 10 players. image
  • Completionist Cape fully customizable into 10+ colours image 1 image 2 image 3
  • Near Runescape clanchat excluding lootshare, image
  • Quick prayers.

[/CENTER]
